title: Claiming the Prince:  Book Two
description:
No matter where she goes, she can’t escape the Princes.
When Magda fled back to the mortal world, she escaped death, her bloodthirsty cousin, and the endless strife of her magical homeland. Or so she thought…She should’ve known better.Before long, she’s forced back to the Lands, torn between two Princes. One passionate, stubborn, and fiery. The other dark, powerful, and merciless. And both determined to see the other dead.War is coming.Drakes, deception, and dragons. Magic, witches, and betrayal. And one Pixie warrior with ten deadly sharp daggers.The battle in her heart has only just begun.You haven’t read fantasy romance until you’ve read Claiming the Prince. Buy it today and find out what you’ve been missing.
author: Cora Avery
